Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class Span

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.Span
  • public class Span
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single operation within a trace. A span has a name, timing information, attributes, events, and links. Spans form a tree structure within a trace, with parent-child relationships.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Span.SpanScope
      A scope that restores the previous current span when closed.

      • recordException

        public void recordException​(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Records an exception on this span. Adds an event with exception details and sets the status to ERROR.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception

      • recordException

        public void recordException​(java.lang.Throwable exception,
                            ErrorCategory category)
        Records an exception with an error category on this span. Adds standardized error attributes for cross-protocol analysis.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception
        category - the error category

      • recordError

        public void recordError​(ErrorCategory category,
                        int protocolCode,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Records an error condition with category and protocol-specific code. This method provides comprehensive error information for telemetry.
        Parameters:
        category - the error category
        protocolCode - the protocol-specific error code (e.g., HTTP 404, SMTP 550)
        message - the error message

      • recordError

        public void recordError​(ErrorCategory category,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Records an error condition with category only (no protocol code).
        Parameters:
        category - the error category
        message - the error message

      • recordExceptionWithCategory

        public void recordExceptionWithCategory​(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Records an exception with automatic category detection. Uses ErrorCategory.fromException(java.lang.Throwable) to classify the exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception

      • end

        public void end()
        Ends this span with the current time. After a span is ended, no more modifications can be made.

      • makeCurrent

        public Span.SpanScope makeCurrent()
        Makes this span the current span in the trace. Returns a scope that will restore the previous current span when closed.
        Returns:
        a scope object
